title: Microreactor assisted soft lithography of nanostructured antimony sulfide thin film patterns: nucleation, growth and application in solid state batteries
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, 3,2200-2211
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00436A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Bryan Chun, V. Vinay K. Doddapaneni, Marcos Lucero, Changqing Pan, Zhongwei Gao, Zhenxing Feng, Rajiv Malhotra, Chih-hung Chang
This study explores the microreactor-assisted soft lithography (MASL) method for direct, one-step synthesis and patterning of additive-free antimony sulfide (Sb2S3) nanostructured thin films.
